item.title: 奥斯特德以14亿欧元将欧洲陆上风电业务出售给CIP集团
item.description: 奥斯特德公司已同意以14亿欧元（约合16.5亿美元）的价格将其欧洲陆上业务出售给丹麦投资者哥本哈根基础设施合伙公司。【原文：Orsted A/S has agreed to sell its European onshore business to Danish investor Copenhagen Infrastructure Partners for €1.4 billion ($1.65 billion).】

item.title: 印度首席顾问称美印协议后经济增长将超预期
item.description: 印度首席经济顾问表示，在美国大幅降低对印度商品的关税后，印度经济增速可能超过政府此前预测。【原文：India’s economy could grow even faster than the government’s earlier forecast after the US substantially lowered tariffs on Indian goods, the country’s chief economic adviser said.】

item.title: 土耳其1月通胀率降至30.7%，降幅低于预期
item.description: 土耳其通胀率在1月份连续第四个月放缓，但由于食品和其他商品的季节性价格上涨，降幅低于分析师预期。【原文：Turkish inflation slowed for the fourth month in a row in January, albeit less than analysts expected due to seasonal price rises on food and other goods.】

item.title: 中国白银基金重估引发31%暴跌，投资者强烈反对
item.description: 瑞银深投信基金管理公司调整了其22亿美元白银基金的估值模型，以更紧密地追踪全球期货价格，此举导致该基金净资产价值创纪录下跌，引发投资者强烈抗议——这些投资者此前已因贵金属价格暴跌遭受重创。【原文：UBS SDIC Fund Management Co. changed the valuation model for a $2.2 billion silver fund to more closely track global futures prices, triggering a record drop in its net asset value and outcry among investors already bruised by a precious metals slump.】

item.title: 任天堂利润令人失望，内存价格上涨构成压力
item.description: 任天堂公司公布的季度利润增幅低于预期，尽管Switch 2主机销量稳健，但这加剧了业界对内存芯片成本上涨的担忧。【原文：Nintendo Co. reported a smaller-than-expected quarterly profit gain despite solid sales of the Switch 2, fueling concern about the rising cost of memory chips.】

item.title: 金银价格反弹，英国股市将保持平稳
阿克苏诺贝尔警告称今年将面临艰难局面，盈利改善幅度有限
item.description: 阿克苏诺贝尔公司预计2026年盈利改善有限，这家荷兰涂料制造商正面临客户需求疲软的困境——在持续的经济不确定性面前，客户正收紧开支。【原文：Akzo Nobel NV sees little earnings improvement in 2026 as the Dutch paint maker contends with sluggish demand from customers who are reining in spending in the face of persistent economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 香港顶级开发商在停滞后寻求6.4亿美元贷款
item.description: 香港最大开发商新鸿基地产有限公司正寻求至少50亿港元（6.4亿美元）的贷款，这是该公司去年跳过年度再融资后重返市场。【原文：Hong Kong’s largest developer Sun Hung Kai Properties Ltd. is seeking a loan of at least HK$5 billion ($640 million), returning to the market after skipping its annual refinancing last year.】

item.title: 匈牙利大胆押注吸引投资者，关键大选临近
item.description: 在可能重新定义匈牙利未来的选举前夕，投资者正加码押注该国的股票、债券和货币。【原文：Investors are stepping up bold wagers on Hungary’s stocks, bonds and currency ahead of elections that could redefine the country’s future.】

item.title: 欧瑞泽与潘神集团达成4.8亿欧元信贷二级基金交易
item.description: 据彭博新闻获得的声明显示，资产管理公司欧瑞泽（Eurazeo SE）已为其私募信贷续期基金募集4.8亿欧元资金，并与二级市场投资者潘神资本（Pantheon）达成合作。【原文：Asset manager Eurazeo SE has collected €480 million for a private credit continuation fund, partnering with secondaries investor Pantheon, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 安巴尼、阿达尼集团股价在美印贸易协议后飙升
item.description: 印度与美国宣布达成备受期待的贸易协议后，亿万富翁穆克什·安巴尼和高塔姆·阿达尼旗下的旗舰企业股价飙升，此举缓解了持续数月的地缘政治紧张局势。【原文：The flagship firms of billionaires Mukesh Ambani and Gautam Adani saw their shares surge after India and the US announced a much-awaited trade pact, easing months of geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 新世界股份因黑石谈判涨势回吐涨幅
item.description: 香港建筑商新世界发展有限公司股价已回落至上周传出黑石集团正洽谈成为其最大单一股东消息前的水平，因市场对其未来发展路径的疑虑日益加剧。【原文：Hong Kong builder New World Development Co. has fallen back in the stock market to where it traded before news last week that Blackstone Inc. was in talks to become its single largest shareholder, as questions mount about the path forward.】

item.title: 印度出口有望增长，因美国将关税削减至18%
item.description: 美国降低印度商品进口关税后，印度出口商将迎来发展机遇。此举缓解了数月来的不确定性，并引发印度国内市场大幅上涨。【原文：Indian exporters are set for a boost after the US lowered tariffs on shipments from the country, a move that eased months of uncertainty and triggered a sharp rally in local markets.】

item.title: 汇丰策略师称需警惕信贷领域"人工智能狂热"
item.description: 汇丰银行策略师指出，在市场对人工智能技术的乐观情绪推动收益率溢价降至数十年最低水平后，信贷投资者应警惕与"人工智能狂热"相关的潜在下行风险。【原文：Credit investors should guard against potential downside risks tied to “AI exuberance” after optimism around the technology helped yield premiums drop to their lowest in decades, according to HSBC Bank strategists.】

item.title: 亿万富翁郭世德考虑将国浩地产马来西亚私有化
item.description: 据知情人士透露，亿万富翁郭令灿正考虑将其在马来西亚的房地产开发部门私有化。【原文：Billionaire Quek Leng Chan is weighing taking his property developer unit in Malaysia private, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 比特币反弹乏力后停滞不前，期权信号警示谨慎
item.description: 比特币周二持续承压，在从10个月低点短暂反弹后再度停滞，因期权交易中交易员的谨慎情绪持续存在。【原文：Bitcoin remained under pressure Tuesday, stalling after a brief rebound from a 10-month low as trader caution persisted in options activity.】

item.title: 中国外卖价格战趋缓，品牌商纷纷提价
item.description: 中国主要餐饮连锁品牌，包括肯德基和可提咖啡，正纷纷上调价格并削减外卖平台补贴，结束了多年来压低利润率的折扣竞争。【原文：Major restaurant and beverage chains in China, including KFC and Cotti Coffee, are raising prices and cutting back subsidies on food delivery platforms, retreating from years of discounting that squeezed margins for many.】

item.title: 调查显示，兰德公司股价在经历一年上涨后仍被低估
item.description: 一项针对投资者和经济学家的调查显示，南非兰特当前汇率处于低估状态。随着政府改革计划推动经济增长，他们认为该货币仍有进一步升值空间。【原文：South Africa’s rand is undervalued at current levels, according to a survey of investors and economists, who see scope for further currency appreciation as the government’s reform program boosts economic growth.】

item.title: 日本十年期国债发行需求低于过去12个月平均水平
item.description: 日本周二举行的十年期国债拍卖需求低于过去12个月的平均水平，因投资者在即将举行的众议院选举前愈发谨慎。【原文：Japan’s 10-year government bond auction Tuesday saw demand that was weaker than the 12-month average, as investor caution mounts ahead of the upcoming lower house election.】

item.title: 澳大利亚加息以应对不断加剧的价格压力
item.description: 澳大利亚央行周二上调基准利率，成为今年首个加息的主要货币当局。该行认为国内通胀压力持续存在，足以证明有必要重新收紧货币政策。【原文：Australia’s central bank raised its key interest rate on Tuesday, becoming the first major monetary authority to hike this year, as it judged domestic inflation pressures were persistent enough to warrant renewed restraint.】

item.title: 央行基准贷款利率降至历史最低水平 助力经济增长
item.description: 据知情人士透露，中国已将银行一年期政策贷款利率降至历史最低水平，以降低融资成本以提振经济增长。【原文：China has let the interest rate on a one-year policy loan to banks drop to a record low, according to people familiar with the situation, lowering funding costs so as to revive economic growth.】

item.title: 前高盛业务开拓者创立的Primavera基金正寻求募资
item.description: 知情人士透露，普瑞玛资本正考虑设立一只新的亚洲基金，投资于科技和消费等领域的公司，加入该地区众多寻求新资金的私募股权公司行列。【原文：Primavera Capital is weighing a new Asia fund to invest in companies including in the technology and consumer sectors, joining a raft of private equity firms in the region seeking fresh money, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国科技股因税务担忧跌至熊市边缘
item.description: 中国科技股遭遇突然抛售，推动关键股指逼近熊市边缘，因市场担忧监管机构将对互联网企业征税。【原文：An abrupt selloff in Chinese technology shares pushed a key index to the brink of a bear market, as concerns grew about authorities slapping a tax on internet firms.】

item.title: 据称SiTime即将以30亿美元收购瑞萨电子时序业务部门
item.description: 据知情人士透露，模拟芯片制造商SiTime公司即将达成一项收购瑞萨电子计时器业务的协议，交易金额可能达到约30亿美元。【原文：Analog chipmaker SiTime Corp. is nearing a deal to acquire Renesas Electronics Corp.’s timing unit in a deal that could be worth about $3 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 泰国政权如今由一位痴迷足球的乡村强人掌控
item.description:
曼谷亲王室势力正寄望于新英·吉德乔布，希望他能在2月8日的选举中协助抵御亲民主改革派，并组建政府。

【原文：

Bangkok’s royalist establishment is looking to Newin Chidchob to help fend off pro-democracy reformers and form a government in the Feb. 8 election.

】

item.title: 芯片设计公司蒙太奇据悉将以9.02亿美元在香港上市定价
item.description: 知情人士透露，中国芯片设计公司蒙特吉科技计划以最高定价在香港上市，预计将筹集70亿港元（约合9.02亿美元）。【原文：Chinese chip designer Montage Technology Co. is planning to price its Hong Kong listing at the highest possible figure, according to people familiar with the matter, putting it on course to raise HK$7 billion ($902 million).】

item.title: 特朗普关税下调料将提振印度股市多头信心
item.description: 备受期待的贸易协议也可能为卢比带来喘息之机。【原文：Much-awaited trade deal could also bring reprieve for the rupee.】

item.title: 亚洲股市因人工智能乐观情绪反弹，金属价格回升
item.description: 亚洲股市收复了周一暴跌的部分失地，得益于贵金属市场的反弹以及人工智能交易领域重新燃起的热情。【原文：Asian stocks regained some losses from Monday’s steep selloff, buoyed by a rebound in the precious metals market and resurgent excitement in artificial intelligence trading.】

item.title: 铜价结束连续两日下跌，金属抛售潮趋缓
item.description: 铜价在创下历史新高后大幅回落，随后出现反弹，因以白银和黄金为首的全球金属抛售潮有所缓解。【原文：Copper rebounded following a sharp retreat from a record high, as a global metals selloff that was led by silver and gold eased.】

item.title: 韩国总统李明博誓言粉碎房地产投机“魔鬼”
item.description: 韩国总统李在明对房地产投机活动发出异常严厉的警告，敦促多房主们思考因房价飞涨而无力购房的"数百万年轻人的血泪"。【原文：South Korean President Lee Jae Myung delivered an unusually stark warning against real estate speculation, urging multi-homeowners to consider “the blood and tears of millions of young people” unable to buy homes due to runaway prices.】
